issue.title: [CF 246] Custom texture for all icon types
issue.body:
Persi said
Wednesday, June 29, 2011 8:34:50 AM

"Hi! I love the addon and I've been telling all my guildies about how great it is! I find it especially useful in PvP. I do have one question though....Is there a way to change the displayed icon? I have two different setups that happen to use the same image and I would like to be able to choose something different so it wouldn't be too confusing. "


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #246 | Raw
